meanings.definition: The action of enhancing or improving something.
meanings.sent1: The enhancements to the software made it faster and more efficient.
meanings.sent2: She added enhancements to her presentation to make it more engaging.
meanings.sent3: The enhancements to the recipe turned out to be a disaster, as the cake collapsed.
meanings.sent4: His enhancements to the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The enhancements to the car's engine made it purr like a contented cat.

meanings.definition: A thing that increases or improves something.
meanings.sent1: The new paint job was an enhancement to the old building.
meanings.sent2: The enhancements in technology have revolutionized communication.
meanings.sent3: The enhancements to the costume made the actor look like a clown.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the enhancement that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The enhancements in the recipe turned a simple dish into a gourmet meal.
